thread.title: 1,000-foot water slide event comes to Phoenix
thread.title_full: 1,000-foot water slide event comes to Phoenix

author: eTN Global Editor
title: 1,000-foot water slide event comes to Phoenix
text:
1,000-foot water slide event comes to Phoenix Adv: The 1,000-ft. slide has made its appearance in other major cities Adv: 
PHOENIX, AZ - The citizens of Phoenix will find a unique way to cool off as this summer season comes to a close: A 1,000 Foot slip-n-slide that's over three-and-a-half football fields long. The Urban Slide, as its called, will be placed on the 7th Street bridge next to Chase Field during the upcoming weekend of August 1st and 2nd. 
The Urban Slide has recently held events this year in other major cities such as Dallas, Houston, Jacksonville, Baltimore, and Denver. 
The slide is made slippery by a unique water misting system that drastically cuts down on both water consumption and the need for soap. To make things even more unique, The Urban Slide will also have a night session that will be held Saturday night. 
Other features and amenities of The Urban Slide will include: 
• Food trucks to give out lunch and snacks to participants and onlookers 
• Music which will play beats along the entire slide 
• Store items such as cellphone covers, bags, glasses, extra inflatable tubes, and more
